```{r setup}
library(polySimIBD)
```


```{r}
set.seed(1)
# define parameters
mean_coi <- 3
K <- 5
pos <- seq(0,1e6,1e5)
m <- 0.1
rho <- 1e-6


start <- Sys.time()
ret <- sim_structured_WF(pos = pos,
                         K = K, 
                         m = m,
                         rho = rho, 
                         mean_coi
                         )

end <- Sys.time()
end-start

ret[[2]][[2]]

```
